com.deezer.sdk.player.event

Interface OnPlayerErrorListener


  • public interface OnPlayerErrorListener
    Defines the behavior of a listener of the player's errors. It will be notified of the any error that happens in the player's lifecycle.
    Author:
    Deezer
    See Also:
    Player

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onPlayerError(java.lang.Exception ex, long timePosition)
      Callback method that will be called when an exception occurs inside the player.

    • Method Detail

      • onPlayerError

        void onPlayerError(java.lang.Exception ex,
                 long timePosition)
        Callback method that will be called when an exception occurs inside the player.
        Parameters:
        ex - the exception that caused an error.
        timePosition - the position (in ms) in the track.
